---
title: generate_ind_sect_var
description: |
  Generate an industry sector variable in ACS or CPS microdata.
categories: ["ACS and CPS microdata utilities"]
---

## Description

`generate_ind_sect_var` generates a categorical variable for industry sectors representing 2-digit [2017 North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) sectors](https://www.census.gov/naics/?58967?yearbck=2017).

For ACS microdata, the variable `indp` must exist. For CPS microdata, the variable `peioind` must exist.

::: callout-caution
Not all ACS or CPS data years use the 2017 NAICS. This command will not work properly for data years that use other NAICS versions.
:::

## Syntax

``` stata
generate_ind_sect_var newvar, dataset(acs|cps) [options]
```

| Options           | Description                                                   |
|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| `dataset(string)` | The type of dataset in memory; ACS or CPS (case insensitive). |
| `nolabel`         | Do not assign value labels to *newvar*.                       |
